name: 糖醋排骨 (The flavor of love )
name_original: 糖醋排骨 (The flavor of love )
description:
在中国，糖醋排骨是一份常见的家常菜，它承载了很多人的记忆与爱。

In China, the sweet and sour sparerib is a common domestic dish, which carries the memory and love of many people.

在这个游戏中，你将会体验到一位阿尔兹海默症患者的心路历程与症状演化历程。玩家通过游戏内置运动感应技术，可以切身实地额体验到身体四肢逐渐不协调，缓慢僵硬的衰老感受。对于玩家而言，也是一次神奇的体验，心灵之旅。

In this game, you will experience the mental journey and symptom evolution of an Alzheimer's patient. Through the game's built-in motion sensing technology, players can personally experience the aging feeling of gradual incongruity and slow stiffness of the limbs of the body. For the player, it is also a magical experience, a spiritual journey.

声明：本游戏使用了基于摄像头的体感技术，游玩前请确保打开摄像头，并仔细阅读安装说明↓。

Tips：This game uses camera based motion sensing technology. Please make sure to install the camera before playing, and carefully read the installation instructions↓.

步骤一：打开core.exe，并等待黑框中出现 "INFO: Created TensorFlow Lite XNNPACK delegate for CPU. " 且摄像头被唤醒

步骤二： 打开游戏exe程序即可开始游玩

Step 1: open the core.exe, and wait for info:"created tensorflow Lite xnnpack delegate for CPU" to appear in the black box And the camera is awakened

Step 2: open the game exe program to start playing
